TextView.android:text:
Road Genie will help you to find an optimal path between your source and destination.
User has the option to choose from 15 different locations in Dhaka city. User will select his source and destination by choosing from the 'From' and 'To' field. He/she can also fix the preference of time or price that he wants to minimize.
Then the optimal route between source and destination is highlighted.
To view textual representation f the route, user can press the 'See Details' button and and a text will be shown showing the details of the route and necessary bus services needed.
